scripts.build: shx mkdir -p ./target/site && shx cp -r index.html 404.html README.md assets bio contents ./target/site
scripts.test: echo Testing is unnecessary and does not exist.
scripts.start: browser-sync start --no-notify --server --files index.html README.md assets/**/* bio/**/* contents/**/* serverlessconf-tokyo-2018.html
